description: First day of the road trip to LA. Jesse and Jessica find a hot guy at a truck stop. Devin is stuck there with a broken down vehicle. Jesse and Jessica have been driving for hours and are looking for a little action. They seductively invite Devin along for a ride and he eagerly accepts. After a bit of fun in there RV they all decide to head to their hotel to get a little more frisky..
title: Roadtrip part 1
